feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:42 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 09:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
